name: BuddyPress User Activity
author: Jomol MJ

sections.description:
BuddyPress User Activity plugin allows you to get five latest activity stream of logged-in user throughout the site, and which can display with any post/page using shortcode.
Additionally, this plugin gives you a Widget of activity stream to provide a simple and easy-to-use way of giving design and structure control of your BuddyPress site.

Features include:

  • List recent five activities of a logged-in user
  • Shortcode available to list the activity stream
  • Widget available to list the activity stream
sections.installation:
The plugin is simple to install:

  1. Download bp-user-activity.zip
  2. Unzip
  3. Upload bp-user-activity directory to your /wp-content/plugins directory
  4. Go to the plugin management page and enable the plugin “BuddyPress User Activity”

Otherwise, Use the Plugin browser, upload it and activate, you are done.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

The plugin is simple to install:

  1. Download bp-user-activity.zip
  2. Unzip
  3. Upload bp-user-activity directory to your /wp-content/plugins directory
  4. Go to the plugin management page and enable the plugin “BuddyPress User Activity”

Otherwise, Use the Plugin browser, upload it and activate, you are done.

How to Use

Add the shortcode [user-activity-stream] in your post or page. For detailed usage instruction, please visit plugin page [https://codingdom.wordpress.com/buddypress-user-activity/].
